name: Cerulean Crystal Tear
effect: restores half of one's maximum FP.

name: Cerulean Hidden Tear
effect: removes all FP consumption

name: Crimson Bubbletear
effect: automatically heals one's HP in the moment before death

name: Crimson Crystal Tear
effect: restores half of one's maximum HP

name: Crimsonburst Crystal Tear
effect: gradually restores one's HP over time

name: Crimsonspill Crystal Tear
effect: Steadily restores one's HP over time

name: Crimsonwhorl Bubbletear
effect: converts incoming damage into recovered HP instead.

name: Dexterity-knot Crystal Tear
effect: temporarily boosts one's dexterity

name: Faith-knot Crystal Tear
effect: temporarily boosts one's faith

name: Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear
effect: Temporarily boosts the power of one's fire attacks.

name: Greenburst Crystal Tear
effect: gradually restores stamina recovery speed

name: Greenspill Crystal Tear
effect: temporarily raises one's maximum stamina

name: Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear
effect: Temporarily boosts holy attacks

name: Intelligence-knot Crystal Tear
effect: boosts one's intelligence

name: Leaden Hardtear
effect: Temporarily boosts poise

name: Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear
effect: Temporarily boosts lightning attacks

name: Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear
effect: Temporarily boosts magic attacks

name: Opaline Bubbletear
effect: Provides significant damage negation

name: Opaline Hardtear
effect: temporarily boosts all forms of damage negation

name: Purifying Crystal Tear
effect: purifies the curse from Mohg, Lord of Blood's terrifying rite of blood

name: Ruptured Crystal Tear
effect: Causes concoction to explode in mixed physick

name: Speckled Hardtear
effect: temporarily raises all resistances and heals all status ailments

name: Spiked Cracked Tear
effect: increases the power of charged attacks

name: Stonebarb Cracked Tear
effect: more likely to break enemy stances

name: Strength-knot Crystal Tear
effect: temporarily boosts one's strength

name: Thorny Cracked Tear
effect: consecutive attacks grow stronger the longer they continue

name: Twiggy Cracked Tear
effect: Briefly stop rune loss on death

name: Windy Crystal Tear
effect: increases the effectiveness of dodgerolls

name: Winged Crystal Tear
effect: Temporarily reduces equipment load.
